title: Bloomberg Markets: Geothermal Startup From Google X
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Geothermal Startup From Google X
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kathy Hannun  Chief Executive Officer Dandelion Discussing geothermal startup that can heat and cool air or water in homes, born out of the moonshot factory formerly known as Google X.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
